title: My Portfolio
desc: My portfolio website serves as a showcase for my projects, highlighting my skills and demonstrating what I can create.

title: Neues aus Aschaffenburg
desc: Neues aus Aschaffenburg is a news website designed to aggregate and showcase local news from the Aschaffenburg area, providing a centralized platform for regional updates.
myJob:
This project showcases a website built from a design crafted in Adobe XD by the in-house designer. Leveraging React, I contributed extensively to the development process, implementing key features and ensuring a seamless user experience.

Key Contributions:

  • Navigation & Footer: Designed and implemented the fully responsive navbar with a burger menu and developed the website footer.
  • Landing Page & Core Components: Played a central role in creating the landing page and various reusable components, including: Buttons and their interactive states, Popular-cards, Picture-cards, and Newest-cards for showcasing content dynamically, Special news cards and an environmental display component.
  • Animations & Interactions: Developed loading and fade-in animations to enhance the user experience, as well as "Show More/Less" functionality for interactive content display.
  • Responsiveness: Optimized layouts and components for various screen sizes.

This project reflects my ability to transform design concepts into fully functional, user-friendly web applications with attention to detail and performance.

title: Fastlane Logistix
desc: Fastlane Logistix is a modern and responsive company website, with user-friendly navigation, professional design elements, and optimized performance to enhance online presence and customer engagement.
myJob:
This project involved transforming a professionally designed Adobe XD prototype, crafted by the in-house designer, into a fully functional and responsive website using Vue.js.

Key Contributions:

  • Vue.js Application Setup: Established the foundation of the website as a Vue.js app using Vite.
  • Vue Router Configuration: Implemented and configured the Vue Router to manage seamless navigation between pages.
  • Navigation Bar Development: Designed and coded the website's responsive navigation bar, incorporating hover effects for an enhanced user experience.
  • Page Development:
    • Developed the entire Landing Page, aligning closely with the design specifications to maintain visual consistency.
    • Also built the Legal Notice and Data Privacy pages with careful attention to detail.
  • Responsive Design: Ensured the website is fully responsive across a range of devices, providing an optimal user experience for all screen sizes.
  • Transitions and User Experience Enhancements:
    • Added smooth fade-in transitions for page navigation, creating a polished and professional feel.
    • Optimized loading times by preloading background images and managing transitions effectively.

This project reflects my ability to turn a design concept into a dynamic, user-friendly website while prioritizing performance and responsiveness.

title: 1. FC Südring
desc: FC Südring is a professional football club website showcasing team pictures, match schedules, a score history, and a gallery to highlight key moments.
myJob:
This project involved transforming a design created in Adobe XD by the in-house designer into a fully functional website. Using modern development tools and frameworks, I brought the design to life with the following~

Key Contributions:

  • Project Setup: Initiated and structured the React project using Vite for an efficient development workflow.
  • Navigation System: Implemented React Router to enable seamless navigation across the website.
  • Core Components: Developed the landing page and a responsive navigation bar featuring a burger menu for mobile devices.
  • Page Development:
    • Built the "Jugend" and "Mannschaft" pages.
    • Created the "Legal Information" and "Data Privacy" pages to meet compliance requirements.
    • Designed and implemented the "Medien" page.
  • Footer Integration: Added a dynamic and visually cohesive footer to complete the website layout.

This project highlights my ability to collaborate with designers and turn static designs into interactive, user-friendly websites.

title: Career Threads
desc: Career-Threads is a streamlined website presenting a categorized list of job markets, organized by different career fields, with a clean design for easy navigation and quick access to information.
myJob:
For this project, I transformed a detailed Adobe XD design, created by the in-house designer, into a fully functional and responsive website. The development was done using React, initialized with Vite.

Key Contributions:

  • Project Initialization: Set up the React environment and implemented React Router for seamless navigation.
  • Frontpage Development: Developed and styled the header, including mapping dynamic content and ensuring a cohesive design for all buttons.
  • Privacy Compliance: Created a dedicated Data Privacy page to meet compliance requirements.
  • Responsive Design: Integrated media queries to ensure the website is fully responsive across various devices.
  • Interactive Features: Implemented a loading animation and developed a mobile-friendly burger menu for enhanced usability.

This project highlights my ability to collaborate effectively with design teams, write clean, maintainable code, and focus on delivering a polished, user-centric digital experience.

title: YIP! Your Image Board
desc: YIP! is an image board web application enabling users to register, log in, customize their profiles with a username and profile picture, share images, and engage with posts through comments.

title: Text Based Dungeon Crawler
desc: A terminal-based mini game created as part of a full-time web development course exercise. The task focused on practicing JavaScript by working in teams to design and build a terminal-only application.
